column4: i dont have file system, i try to install to my PS3, and always had problems, finally i cant to install this to my PS3, and put it in my PC, now my PC (linux) say that the hard disk had bad block :(
so this  is an empty unpartioned hard drive?
id use a gparted live cd, and have it partion/format/check tghe drive then.
hard drives are the weakest link these days. you may get the hd  working. but i wouldent trust it  with critical stuff.. without a lot of backups
